entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tatamagouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Debert 10:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 7:21 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:21 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 7:21 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
